item.description:
Friday, January 18, 2013 6:00 PM

to Sunday, January 20, 2013, 2:00 PM
Innitou Ski Runners
Glen, NH
Depot Street

We will be at our Ski Lodge in NH - This will be a Great weekend at theSki Lodge! We are expecting many Fun Folks to Stay & Play with us for Friday and Saturday night. Contact Jenny for details, or to reserve a bunk.
Members will be skiing Wildcat, Attitash, Bretton Woods and others will be cross country and snow shoeing. Join us for some fun. Shoooing etc. social activities.

group.name: Innitou Ski Runners & Rider's Activities Club of New England

item.name: Winter Weekend Fun at the Innitou Ski Runners!!
